title: AASQ #104: MicroSHIFT explain the pros and cons of clutch derailleur mechanisms
content:
We know, there’s no such thing as a stupid question. But there are some questions you might not want to ask your local shop or riding buddies. AASQ is our weekly series where we get to the bottom of your questions – serious or otherwise. This time it’s all about clutch derailleur mechanisms! Hit the […]
